sources.title: Porky in the North Woods (1936)
sources.description: Jean Batiste catches many of Porkyâ€™s animal friends in his traps, so Porky follows him and releases the animals as soon as they are trapped. Jean learns of this and captures Porky.

metadata.Plot: Porky runs a game refuge. Despite the abundant signs to the contrary, Jean-Baptiste the trapper sets numerous traps. Porky rescues the animals from the traps. Jean-Baptiste tracks him down and beats him up. The animals come to Porky's rescue.
metadata.Actors: Billy Bletcher, Joe Dougherty, Bernice Hansen
